All flight and airport data is sourced from Aviation Edge, a publicly available aviation data provider.

0. Log Data:

We want to inform you that whenever you use our Service, in case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through Play Services) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your devices's Internet Protocol address, device name, operating system version, configuration of the app when utilising our Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.
P. EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):

Personal data are only collected by Google Play Services and Admob. The service is compliant to GDPR. So in Europe users will be requested to answer if they prefer personalized ads or non personalized ads. At any time the user can change the preference heading to the 'Settings' menu option.
Q. California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA):

Personal data are only collected by Google Play Services and Admob. The service is compliant to CCPA. We use AdMob's support leveraging Restricted data processing (Google's RDP). At any time the user can change the preference heading to the 'Settings' menu option.
